pages.text: Whenever you leave your home, you carry half a tool shed with you. Given the tons of stone you can carry around with you, that's almost nothing. Nevertheless, a universal tool that combines the abilities of a pickaxe, axe, shovel and hoe would suit you well.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)Not as efficient in the individual tasks, but much better than having to change tools every three seconds.
